content.en: Optimizing Electric Generators: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize the design of various types of electric generators and motors. They are exploring questions such as how to improve the performance of axial-flux permanent magnet synchronous generators, reduce pulsating torque in these machines, and optimize wind generators for low cost and high energy yield. Algorithms like genetic algorithms, Taguchi experimental design, and simplex algorithms are being employed to find the best designs and parameters for these devices.
content.da: Optimering af elektriske generatorer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere designet af forskellige typer elektriske generatorer og motorer. De undersøger spørgsmål som, hvordan man kan forbedre ydeevnen af akselfluks-permanente magnet-synkron generatorer, reducere pulserende moment i disse maskiner og optimere vindgeneratorer for lave omkostninger og højt energiforbrug. Algoritmer som genetiske algoritmer, Taguchi-eksperimentel design og simplex-algoritmer bliver anvendt for at finde de bedste designs og parametre for disse enheder.
